title: MCP Security Policy
description: Schema for mcp-security.yaml — developer-facing security policy configuration for MCP Gateway.

tenant.description: Tenant-specific values interpolated into classifier patterns (e.g., {company_domain}).

tool_overrides.description: Per-service, per-tool annotation overrides. Keys are service names, values are tool override maps.

classifiers.description: Per-service, per-tool argument classifiers. Keys are service names.

value_extractors.description: Per-service, per-tool value extractors. Extract argument values into labels for Layer 2 evaluation.

policies.description: Policy rules evaluated in priority order (lowest number = highest priority). First match wins.

readOnlyHint.description: Tool does not modify its environment.

idempotentHint.description: Repeated calls with same arguments have no additional effect.

openWorldHint.description: Tool may interact with external entities.

verb.description: Kubernetes-style RBAC verb for the operation type.

classifierRule.description: An argument classifier rule that matches a field value and sets labels.

field.description: The argument field name to inspect.

contains.description: Match if the field value contains this substring.

not_contains.description: Match if the field value does NOT contain this substring.

present.description: Match if the field is present (true) or absent (false).

greater_than.description: Match if the numeric field value is greater than this threshold.

less_than.description: Match if the numeric field value is less than this threshold.

equals_value.description: Match if the field value equals this value (string or numeric).

set_labels.description: Labels to add when this classifier matches.

serviceToolOverrides.description: Per-tool overrides for a service. Keys are tool names.

serviceClassifiers.description: Per-tool classifiers for a service. Keys are tool names.

valueExtractor.description: Extracts an argument field value into a label for Layer 2 evaluation.

field.description: The argument field name to extract.

label_prefix.description: Label prefix. The extracted value is appended after a colon (e.g., "arg:amount" → "arg:amount:500").

serviceValueExtractors.description: Per-tool value extractors for a service. Keys are tool names.

policyCondition.description: Conditions for a policy rule to match.

policyRule.description: A policy rule that matches conditions and triggers an action.

name.description: Human-readable name for this policy rule.

description.description: Detailed description of what this rule does and why.

when.description: Conditions that must be met for this rule to match.

match.description: How to combine conditions: 'all' (AND) or 'any' (OR). Default: 'any'.

action.description: What to do when this rule matches. npl_evaluate delegates to a contextual routing protocol (Layer 2).

approvers.description: Approver roles/identities passed to the NPL protocol (optional, used by ApprovalPolicy).

priority.description: Priority (0-999). Lower number = higher priority. First match wins.
